articles.title: Tips on stepping back from screens and starting a new hobby - AP News
articles.description: A lot of us want to reduce our time spent on screens. Experts say picking up a new hobby can help do that and offer a range of other health benefits. But finding a screen-free hobby that sticks can be easier said than done. Experts advise trying small enjoyab…

articles.title: Metroid Prime 4 Game And Samus Amiibo Preorders Available Now - GameSpot
articles.description: Metroid Prime 4: Beyond launches December 4 on Switch and Switch 2, and fans can also preorder three new Amiibo, an official retrospective book, and more.

articles.title: I tried Apple's 2 big AI features announced at the iPhone 17 event - and both are game changers - ZDNET
articles.description: Apple focused on its cutting edge hardware for the iPhone 17 launch, but also unveiled a couple groundbreaking AI features. Both could make a big difference in daily use.

articles.title: Apple iPhone 17 event recap: iPhone Air preorders, Apple Watch 11, AirPods Pro 3, more - ZDNET
articles.description: ZDNET has rounded up everything announced at this week's Apple event - from iPhone 17 preorder deals to the Apple Watch Ultra 3, AirPods Pro 3, and more.

articles.title: Ever wanted to play a Pokémon Animal Crossing meets Minecraft? Pokémon Pokopia might be just that game - Eurogamer
articles.description: A new Minecraft meets Animal Crossing inspired Pokémon game is coming to Switch 2 in 2026.

articles.title: Final Fantasy 7 Remake gets Xbox Series X|S release date - Windows Central
articles.description: Final Fantasy 7 Remake launches on Xbox Series X|S on Jan. 22, 2025, and the whole trilogy is on the way.
